title: On Bayesian Filtering for Markov Regime Switching Models
abstract: This paper presents a framework for empirical analysis of dynamic macroeconomic models using Bayesian filtering, with a specific focus on the state-space formulation of Dynamic Stochastic General Equilibrium (DSGE) models with multiple regimes. We outline the theoretical foundations of model estimation, provide the details of two families of powerful multiple-regime filters, IMM and GPB, and construct corresponding multiple-regime smoothers. A simulation exercise, based on a prototypical New Keynesian DSGE model, is used to demonstrate the computational robustness of the proposed filters and smoothers and evaluate their accuracy and speed for a selection of filters from each family. We show that the canonical IMM filter is faster and is no less, and often more, accurate than its competitors within IMM and GPB families, the latter including the commonly used Kim and Nelson (1999) filter. translated_title: 关于马尔可夫切换模型的贝叶斯滤波
translated_abstract: 本文提出了一个使用贝叶斯滤波的经验分析框架，具体关注具有多个状态的动态随机一般均衡（DSGE）模型的状态空间形式。我们概述了模型估计的理论基础，提供了两个强大的多状态滤波器族——IMM和GPB的详细信息，并构建了相应的多状态平滑器。基于一个典型的新凯恩斯DSGE模型的仿真实验，我们证明了所提出的滤波器和平滑器的计算稳健性，并评估了它们在每个家族中的一系列滤波器中的准确性和速度。我们发现，经典的IMM滤波器在IMM和GPB家族中都更快且准确性不低，而且往往更高，后者包括通常使用的Kim和Nelson（1999）滤波器。将其与匹配的平滑器配对使用可以提高对未观测变量的恢复精度。
tldr: 本文提出了一个使用贝叶斯滤波的分析框架，用于处理具有多个状态的动态宏观经济模型，并展示了两个强大的多状态滤波器的计算稳定性和准确性。以及与其他滤波器相比，IMM滤波器在速度和准确性方面表现更优。
en_tdlr: This paper presents a framework using Bayesian filtering to analyze dynamic macroeconomic models with multiple regimes and demonstrates the computational stability and accuracy of two powerful multiple-regime filters. The canonical IMM filter performs better in terms of speed and accuracy compared to other filters.
